creditline: Gift of Daniel Greenberg and Susan Steinhauser
description: abstract image; bright, multicolored pigments of pink, purple, orange and white in large, swooping brush strokes; pink textured blob in upper left quadrant; gathered textured pigments of white, orange and purple in lower center
markings: LLC in pencil: AP II/III | LLC impressed in paper: RW
medium: Archival pigment print on Epson Ultra Smooth Fine Art paper
signed: LRC in pencil: R Weingarten | LLC on back in pencil: PALETTE SERIES: ROBERT ESTES #1, 200
title: Palette Series: Robert Estes #1
